name: Seventh Generation, Baby Wipes, Unscented and Sensitive,64 Count (Pack of 4)
short_description: Made for your baby’s sensitive skin
Thick and soft wipe for a gentle clean that is safe for baby, hands, and face
0% fragrance, alcohol, parabens, or phenoxyethanol
Hypoallergenic and dermatologist tested
Tape-seal closure makes for easy stacking, ideal for refilling baby wipe dispensers and wipe warmers, contains 64 wipes
product_description: Smooth, soft, and clean – the way a baby’s bottom should be. Seventh Generation Free & Clear Baby Wipes are made for baby’s sensitive skin and contain 0% fragrance, alcohol, parabens, or phenoxyethanol. Our thick, soft wipes are strong enough for big messes while being gentle on newborn baby’s most precious, delicate skin. These baby wipes are moistened with plant-derived skin conditioners like aloe vera and are safe for baby, hands, and face. The tape-seal package design keeps wipes fresh while allowing for easy stacking on nursery shelf and convenient refill for wipe dispensers and warmers. Our hypoallergenic and fragrance free wipes are dermatologist tested and clinically proven to be gentle on baby’s skin. It’s all good, baby. Caring for a little human is a magical undertaking, and we’ve developed an entire line of baby skin care products, wipes, and diapers to bring peace of mind to your journey. For every life-changing milestone, you deserve baby care you can trust.

short_description: Clinically Proven: Pampers Sensitive wipes are clinically proven for sensitive skin
product_description: Clinically proven to protect your little one’s sensitive skin, Pampers Sensitive baby wipes are thick and soft for a gentle clean. Pampers Sensitive baby wipes are the #1 choice of hospitals** and are Skin Health Alliance Dermatologist approved. They are milder than a washcloth and water and help maintain skin’s natural pH. Pampers Sensitive baby wipes are hypoallergenic and free of alcohol, fragrance, parabens, and latex.* Plus, our convenient 1-Wipe pop-top is designed to dispense one wipe at a time, so you only get what you need to tackle the mess at-hand. From Pampers, the #1 pediatrician recommended brand. For healthy skin, use Pampers Sensitive wipes together with Pampers Swaddlers diapers.

Multipurpose Wipes with Peel-Top Access: These travel size baby wipes are made from soft, plant-based, plastic-free materials - perfect for gentle cleaning during diaper changes, wiping sticky hands or faces. Includes a convenient peel-top dispenser for home or travel use.

name: Huggies Natural Care Extra Sensitive Baby Wipes, Unscented, 1 Flip-Top Pack (24 Wipes Total)
short_description: 1 flip-top pack of 24 Huggies Natural Care Sensitive Baby Wipes, Unscented (24 wipes total)
Born from the NICU: These wipes sensitive are developed in partnership with NICU nurses
Formulated for Delicate and Sensitive Skin: Our fragrance-free wipes and are specifically formulated and developed with the most delicate and sensitive skin in mind

An Effective and Gentle Clean: Each diaper wipe is made with purified water to aid in effective cleaning, glycerin for mild skin moisturizing and dimethicone, a skin emollient that allows the wipe to gently glide across skin
No Harsh Irritants: Each disposable wipe has no harsh irritants
Moisturizing Ingredients: Made with moisturizing ingredients, Extra Sensitive baby wipes moisturize and gently clean sensitive baby skin
product_description: Babies with delicate and sensitive skin deserve an effective clean from their baby wipes. With Huggies Natural Care Extra Sensitive Baby Wipes, they can. Developed in partnership with NICU nurses, these sensitive wipes are formulated for the most delicate and sensitive skin. Made with purified water to aid in effective cleaning, glycerin for mild skin moisturizing and dimethicone, a skin emollient that allows the wipe to gently glide across skin. Additionally, each baby wipe has no harsh irritants. Made with moisturizing ingredients, these baby wipes are fragrance free and gentle on sensitive baby skin. Additionally, these plant-based* baby wipes sensitive have been awarded the National Eczema Association Seal of Acceptance. Convenient one-handed dispensing allows for easy changes with these sensitive baby wipes. Pair your Huggies Natural Care Extra Sensitive baby wipes with Huggies baby diapers for a diapering duo that helps protect your baby’s soft and delicate skin. (*65% by weight)

product_description: Gently cleanse your baby's skin and leave it feeling moisturized with Aveeno Baby Sensitive All-Over Fragrance-Free Wipes. Suitable for use from birth, these large and durable disposable wet wipes leave baby's sensitive skin smooth and soothed. From a pediatrician- and dermatologist-recommended brand, the pH-balanced cleansing baby wipes are travel-friendly and have a 99% naturally derived formula* enriched with natural oat extract and aloe. They are made of thick, soft fibers, making them ideal for use on baby's bottom, hands, body and face to help wipes away dirt and germs. The easy open, one-wipe at a time package is great for quick cleanups at home or on-the-go and is resealable to maintain moisture. Accepted by the National Eczema Association, these unscented baby towelettes are hypoallergenic and free of fragrance, alcohol, and phenoxyethanol. *Based upon cumulative volume of ingredients using ISO/DIS16128 (water included)

short_description: 🌿 TRANSPARENT INGREDIENTS: CLOTH: 100% FSC Certified Bamboo Fiber (NOT Bamboo Viscose); 0% Plastic. LIQUID: 99% Pure NZ Purified Water, MG650+ Manuka Honey, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein
🌿 PURE & GENTLE: 100% biodegradable baby wipes. 0% Plastic, Chemicals, Fragrance, Optical Brighteners or other Harsh Ingredients. Gentle on your baby and their world. Made in New Zealand.

🌿 DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED: Terra all-natural baby wipes are rated ‘Excellent’ for all skin types by Dermatest. The natural ingredients in our wet wipes help even the most sensitive skin stay nourished and moisturized while protecting against irritation.

🌿 THICK & TEXTURED: Terra biodegradable wipes are durable and extra moist, with an easy dispensing flip-top lid. Cross-woven for a soft cloth-like texture that is non-irritating while cleaning baby's delicate skin.

🌿 EVERYDAY USE: Terra’s sensitive water wipes are formulated for bums, faces, hands and everyday messes at home and on the go. Never tested on animals. As with all baby wipes, these are not flushable.
product_description: Terra Bamboo Baby Wipes with 99.5% Pure NZ Water and a hint of Manuka Honey are strong and durable, yet soft and fresh. The natural ingredients in our bamboo water wipes have been carefully selected to help even the most sensitive skin stay nourished and moisturized while protecting against rash and irritation. Terra All-Natural Sensitive Baby Wipes are 100% Biodegradable FSC Certified Bamboo Fiber, 0% Plastic or other Harsh Chemicals. Terra Baby Wipes are Unscented and perfect for baby’s sensitive skin. As with all wipes, these are not flushable baby wipes, however, Terra wipes are 100% biodegradable. Unlike other natural baby wipes, Terra biodegradable wipes are thick & durable, with an easy dispensing flip-top lid. Cross woven for a soft cloth-like texture that is non-irritating while cleaning baby's delicate skin. Infused with locally sourced organic MG350+ Manuka Honey, Terra all-natural baby wipes are rated ‘Excellent’ for all skin types by Dermatest and perfect for even the most sensitive newborn skin.
